trans-unit.source: Provides helper functions for exposing events and data for management.
trans-unit.target: 提供 Helper 函数，该函数用于公开管理事件和数据。

trans-unit.source: There is a single instance of this class per application domain.
trans-unit.target: 每个应用程序域都有此类的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.
trans-unit.target: 注意：WMI .NET 库现在视为处于最终状态，且没有可用于会影响这些库的非安全性相关问题的进一步开发、增强或更新。

trans-unit.source: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.
trans-unit.target: [MI API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) 应用于所有新的开发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.Instrumentation.Instrumentation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.Instrumentation.Instrumentation" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes any fields to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 默认构造函数将所有字段初始化为其默认值。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The object that determines the class, properties, and values of the event.
trans-unit.target: 确定事件的类、属性和值的对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises a management event.
trans-unit.target: 引发一个管理事件。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> containing instrumentation instance or event types.
trans-unit.target: 包含检测实例或事件类型的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the instrumentation schema of the specified assembly has already been correctly registered with WMI.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定程序集的检测架构是否已经正确注册到 WMI。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the instrumentation schema in the specified assembly is registered with WMI; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定程序集中的检测架构已注册到 WMI 中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The object that is to be visible through management instrumentation.
trans-unit.target: 要通过管理检测可见的对象。

trans-unit.source: Makes an instance visible through management instrumentation.
trans-unit.target: 使实例通过管理检测可见。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> containing instrumentation instance or event types.
trans-unit.target: 包含检测实例或事件类型的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" />。

trans-unit.source: Registers the management instance or event classes in the specified assembly with WMI.
trans-unit.target: 将指定程序集中的管理实例和事件类注册到 WMI。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the instrumentation schema is accessible to <see cref="N:System.Management" /> client applications.
trans-unit.target: 这确保了检测架构可由 <see cref="N:System.Management" /> 客户端应用程序访问。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: The object to remove from visibility for management instrumentation.
trans-unit.target: 要从管理检测的可见内容中移除的对象。

trans-unit.source: Makes an instance that was previously published through the <see cref="M:System.Management.Instrumentation.Instrumentation.Publish(System.Object)" /> method no longer visible through management instrumentation.
trans-unit.target: 使以前通过 <see cref="M:System.Management.Instrumentation.Instrumentation.Publish(System.Object)" /> 方法发布的实例通过管理检测不再可见。

trans-unit.source: The class for which the batch size is being set.
trans-unit.target: 为其设置批处理规模的类。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of objects to be provided at a time.
trans-unit.target: 一次提供的对象的最大数目。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of objects of the specified type to be provided at a time.
trans-unit.target: 指定一次提供的指定类型对象的最大数目。
